name: RFK'sUSTrivia
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: united states trivia
des:
This Alexa Skill is designed to test your knowledge of our state capitals and U.S. Presidents. When you invoke the skill you will be asked to select either U.S. Capitals as a category or U.S. Presidents. We will record your score automatically. You can hear your score by asking for it. Since there are 95 questions we will store your score even after you cancel the game. That way when you return you can pick up exactly where you left off. Once all the questions have been asked you will be given the option to start over. You can also start over at any point by asking to start over. We sincerely hope you enjoy playing this game as much as we enjoyed making it.

For best result please answer the questions with a question. For example, "Who is George Washington" or "What is Boston".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
